name: adapterjs
description: An external adapter for securely executing user-provided JavaScript and returning the results on-chain.

scripts.setup: (cd faas-sandbox && npm install) & (cd ../database-uploader && npm install) & (cd ../external-adapter-entry && npm install)
scripts.start: (cd database-uploader && npm start) | (cd faas-sandbox && npm start) | (cd external-adapter-entry && npm start)

author: KuphJr
